kex_varon.name: Kex Varon
kex_varon.title: Legendary Bounty Hunter
kex_varon.description: A professional bounty hunter who always gets the target, dead or alive.
kex_varon.philosophy: The hunt is decided before the first shot.
kex_varon.voiceStyle: Calm, deliberate, unemotional. Speaks like someone who already knows the outcome.
kex_varon.tooltip: Kex reflects your character through the lens of the relentless, professional hunt

levelGreetings.1: So you want to hunt sentients for credits. High stakes, dangerous work. Let’s see if you last.
levelGreetings.2: First bounty secured. Don’t confuse luck with skill.
levelGreetings.3: You’re learning it’s never just a fight. Tracking and planning matter more.
levelGreetings.4: Your instincts are sharpening. Anticipation wins hunts.
levelGreetings.5: Your reputation’s building. The guild is noticing.
levelGreetings.6: You’re catching marks others couldn’t. That’s professionalism.
levelGreetings.8: You know when to wait and when to strike. That’s real work.
levelGreetings.9: The hunted will start hunting you. Stay sharp.
levelGreetings.10: You’re a master now. The galaxy’s fugitives won’t escape you.
